description: This file is a test configuration file for Vitest, a testing framework used with Vite in a JavaScript/TypeScript project. It merges a Vite configuration with custom test settings.

methods.name: mergeConfig
methods.description: Merges two Vite configuration objects into one.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines a Vite configuration object with type inference support.

methods.name: configDefaults
methods.description: Provides default configuration options for Vitest.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a file path string.
